Broken Branch06958tiwfmci0w6lhxra76avcrogsc86bjrl1206922014-03-28T23:37:17ZGreater good3347453/* See also */[[Image:Broken Branch.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of the Broken Branch on the continent of Westeros.]]
The '''Broken Branch''' is a river in [[the North]]. The river is so-called for its winding and branching nature. It flows out of the forests and hills near [[Hornwood]] into [[the Bite]]. The castle of [[Ramsgate]] sits near its mouth.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/Moat_Cailin/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Moat Cailin entry]</ref><ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/dreadfort/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Dreadfort entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Broken Branch's headwaters are in the Sheepshead Hills.
